description:
A open source library for Fuzzy Time Series in Python.

For more information:

  • Official site and documentation: https://pyfts.github.io/pyFTS/
  • Code repository and issue tracking: https://github.com/PYFTS/pyFTS
  • A short tutorial on Fuzzy Time Series:
    • Part I: Introduction to the Fuzzy Logic, Fuzzy Time Series and the pyFTS library
    • Part II: High order, weighted and multivariate methods and an case study of solar energy forecasting.
    • Part III: Interval and probabilistic forecasting, non-stationary time series, concept drifts and time variant models.
  • More example codes: https://github.com/PYFTS/notebooks
